projects.title: Jira Ticket Management Clone
projects.description: Created a ticket management clone that offers features like CRUD, changing priorities, filter by colors, locking and unlocking.                        Tech Stack : NodeJs, Plain CSS

projects.title: Excel Clone
projects.description: Created a web version Excel, it contains features like changing font-size, font-style, text-alignment, formula calculation etc.(Vanilla JS , HTML, CSS)

projects.title: TECHY STAR
projects.description: It's a simple react frontend project which depicts one page application without reloading. Tech Stack :(JavaScript, SASS)

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: Used React, TMDB API to make a movie App clone. It contains features like searching , sorting, pagination, local storage was used to sync data across pages. React Route DOM was used for navigation

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: Its a simple react frontend project to showcase development of youtube like Video Player. It depicts a main player page, contact page etc Tech Stack:(JavaScript, ChakraUI ,etc)

projects.title: Crypto App
projects.description: This React frontend App gives the data of Crypto Coins , I have used API's to get data about crypto coins Tech Stack:(JavaScript,Reactjs,ChakraUI, few other pakages)

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: Its a simple project on Cart System to depict working of React-Redux, it puts the data from Home page to cart page and has functionality to delete data from cart page , plus it also calculates the amount

projects.title: LINKEDIN CLONE
projects.description: Its a Linked Clone made using Reactjs and firebase . It has features like Register, LogIn,LogOut,Posting etc

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This project is my  portfolio itself . I have used Firebase to store data from Contact Page, Tech Stack:(React,JavaScript , packages like framer-motion, Carousel etc.
